data.name: Infite
data.detailed_description:
Infite is an Action MOBA that pushes you into the fight with a third person perspective, explosive action, and strategic choice.
An elevated game map with verticality options and lots of personalization using a card system.
Beautiful and diversified heroes design.
Choose from a bunch of well designed free heroes ... with unique Abilities and gameplay.
Combined with different cards from our card system, each new game will give you a new gameplay experience.
Immersive action with strategic choice.
While enjoying INFITE action ... making deep strategic decisions and choosing the right cards will allow you to change your gameplay ... Thus you can turn a lose situation at any moment to your favor.

data.short_description: Infite is an Action MOBA that pushes you into the fight with a third person perspective, explosive action, and strategic choice.An elevated game map with verticality options and lots of personalization using a card system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
